General.Name: Public joint stock company FAR-EASTERN ENERGY COMPANY
General.Description: Public joint stock company FAR-EASTERN ENERGY COMPANY distributes and sells electric energy to individuals and enterprises in Russia. The company operates through Electricity Distribution and Electricity Sales segments. It sells electricity in the wholesale and retail market. The company was incorporared in 2007 and is based in Vladivostok, Russia. Public joint stock company FAR-EASTERN ENERGY COMPANY is a subsidiary of Public Joint-Stock Company RusHydro.
